go_data.justification: Pirh2 acts as an E3 ubiquitin ligase to monoubiquitinate DNA polymerase eta.

go_data.term: negative regulation of translesion DNA synthesis
go_data.justification: Pirh2 suppresses translesion DNA synthesis by monoubiquitinating DNA polymerase eta.
Pirh2 is involved in the ubiquitination of target proteins, such as DNA polymerase eta.
